CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Very recently , 3,6-dithien-2-yl-2 , 5-dialkylpyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione ( DTDPP ) was shown to be a promising building block for the design of photovoltaic polymers.

Let's think step by step.

1. 3,6-dithien-2-yl-2,5-dialkylpyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione

This is the name of the material mentioned in the paragraph. It is a specific chemical compound with the following substructures: 3,6-dithien-2-yl, 2,5-dialkyl, pyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole, and 1,4-dione. Each part of this name can be considered a separate "Material Name" entity.

- 3,6-dithien-2-yl: This is a substituent on the pyrrole ring, and it consists of a dithienyl moiety.
- 2,5-dialkyl: This is another substituent on the pyrrole ring, and it consists of two alkyl groups attached to the 2nd and 5th positions.
- pyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole: This is the core structure of the compound, which is a fused pyrrole ring system.
- 1,4-dione: This is a functional group present in the compound, which consists of two carbonyl groups at the 1st and 4th positions.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. 3,6-dithien-2-yl-2,5-dialkylpyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione (DTDPP)

This is the only entity in the paragraph that clearly refers to the material name. All other entities, such as "very recently," "building block," and "for the design of photovoltaic polymers," are not material names but rather contextual information.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
